CustomField.description: Used in WOLI list to provide more details in the Salestori integration work to the Installer.
CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK( Apartment_number__c ), Configuration_Product__r.Product__r.Name, (Configuration_Product__r.Product__r.Name & " F:" & Floor__c & " A:" & Apartment_number__c ) )
CustomField.label: Combined info OLD
